roleset.note: Treebank offers two different syntaxes (syntactes) for this construction. Under one, the plea and the crime are two separate nodes: (ADJP (ADJ guilty)) (PP (P to)(NP whatever)) Under the other, they are merged: (ADJP (ADJ guilty) (PP (P to) (NP whatever))) You'll have to pick apart the latter syntax to get to the arguments.
